data.what_is: Loclmark is a local marketing automation platform that makes it easy to generate more reviews, list your business online, and more. The review generations process is completley automated, just set it up, add customers information, and the process begins for you. You'll get tons of valuable information about the reviews and can quickly repond right in Loclmark.
data.product_description: Loclmark is a local marketing automation tool that saves small business owners time and makes their local marketing more effective at reaching more customers online.

plan_features: Generate more and better reviews more efficiently.
Speak directly to your customers with full control of how they see your business.
Fully analytics of how your business is doing online.
Respond to all reviews from one dashboard.

initial_reviews.review_title: one of the cheapest web design platform for business
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Loclweb?
Locl web help us to design the best website for the business or any online platform. they are providing hosting and domain facility. their customer service is really amazing  and website create is mobile friendly

What do you dislike about Loclweb?
I prefer they provide 30 days trial. i didn't find much to dislike the website and the website they create is really cool and simple

What problems is Loclweb solving and how is that benefiting you?
overall this is the best affordable web design ever and i recommend this to my friends

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Loclweb?
Pretty intuitive to build a website, even with limited experience

What do you dislike about Loclweb?
Not enough templates to make things really quick to produce

What problems is Loclweb solving and how is that benefiting you?
Setting up simple websites for new markets
